tool_description: Identifies potential funding sources and matches them with program characteristics, providing application guidance and requirements.

program_type.description: Type of program seeking funding (education, health, environment, etc.)

geographic_scope.description: Program geographic reach: local, regional, national, international

target_population.description: Primary population the program will serve

error_messages: Invalid funding amount: Amount must be greater than 0 and less than 100 million.
Invalid organization size: Use one of [small, medium, large].
Invalid geographic scope: Use one of [local, regional, national, international].
Empty program type: Provide a specific program type or focus area.
Undefined target population: Specify the primary population to be served.
usage: Input program type, funding amount, organization size, geographic scope, and target population. Optionally specify funding preferences. Tool identifies matching funding opportunities with application guidance.

foundation_matches.description: Private foundations aligned with program goals

government_opportunities.description: Federal, state, and local government funding options

application_deadlines.description: Key application deadlines and submission requirements
